Almost from the moment BHD owner Brian Detch posted his May 24 to 29 online sale , one item struck a chord with many buyers : a mid-1930 s National Duolian guitar .

A favorite with bluesmen because sound resonated louder in the guitar 's nickel - plated metal body , the National guitar enabled players to overcome crowd noise in the honky tonks where they entertained .
